description:
This is a market on whether a total amount of tweets on the @Snowden Twitter account, as indicated by the resolution source (https://tweetdeck.twitter.com/), on the resolution date of 6:00 PM ET, December 1, 2021. 

This market will resolve to “Yes” if the resolution source indicates 6,700 or more tweets have been posted from the @Snowden Twitter account, by the resolution date and to "No" otherwise.

Should the resolution source be unavailable at the time of resolution and for six hours more, this market will resolve 50-50.

According to the resolution source, at the time of the creation of this market on November 21, 2021 the tweet count for @Snowden was at 6,632.

----------------------------------
Additional Market Information:

- To see the official cumulative tweet count on the resolution source, search the resolution source for the verified @Snowden Twitter account, and check the cumulative numbers of tweets under the “TWEETS” field.

- The number by which the total tweets at expiration exceeds the Baseline may not equal the number of tweets actually posted over that time period, in light of numerous factors, including but not limited to the fact that the account's total tweets upon launch of the market may differ from the Baseline, tweets may be deleted prior to the expiration of this market, and specialized tweets such as quotes, retweets, replies, promoted tweets, may or may not be included in that total.

- Neither Edward Snowden, nor any authorized user of the account in question, need to be the author of any such tweets, nor must any authorized user maintain control of the account.

events.title: Will @Snowden tweet count be over 6,700 on December 1?

question: Will @Snowden tweet count be over 6,700 on December 1?
